TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Surgery to remove the entire vulva (the external female genital organs, including the clitoris, vaginal lips, and the opening to the vagina) and nearby lymph nodes.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cirugía para extraer toda la vulva (los órganos genitales femeninos externos, inclusive el clítoris, los labios de la vagina y la abertura de la vagina) y los ganglios linfáticos cercanos.
